thread.title: Doubletree at its best
thread.title_full: Doubletree at its best - Review of DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London ExCel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: David H
title: Doubletree at its best
text:
Opting for this property during a business trip to the IFE at Excel, I was reminded why I book and stay Hilton.
as a gold member my party enjoyed room upgrades including a fabulous suite, and deluxe twin river view room.
As with every DT I have stayed at, room and suites more than spacious, comfortable, and functional in terms of comfort and and amenities.
What for me, stood out, and made this property refreshingly unique, was the team behind its flawless ability to deliver some of the best DT customer service I have ever had the fortune to experience, for a hotel, in the dock lands, its location to the
Excel Centre suited our needs perfectly.
location, is everything, but service, closely challenges this, and DT Excel, deliveries both.
Thank you for an amazing, flawless, and refreshingly, reminder of why I always choose Hilton, both prior, during and after, the team, led by Michael, represent the exacting standards, one would expect from Hilton property.
Thank you!
